Racquet Games Festival
26  January,  2024
The "Best Buddies - Qatar" Racquet Games Festival, in partnership with the Qatar Tennis Federation, was organized to promote sports integration and develop motor and social skills for persons with disabilities. Participants included 40 members of the Best Buddies-Qatar clubs for government schools from the middle and high school level.
